name: DeeperCORP
description:
DeeperCORP, the first mole digging company.

You'll have to feed the colony and that means digging deep... very deep.

- Recruit moles
- Send them on expeditions
- Buy upgrades
- Keep the colony alive
- And... go deeper!

DeeperCORP is a mini game made alone in less than 48h for the LDJam48.
